name: < is >
description:
In this puzzle math game, you will have to solve inequalities by entering values Xs and Ys, before the schoolbell rings!

You need a mouse and a keyboard to play, but this game doesn't have any character controls.

Made by IlDiavoloVesteRosa for the 3rd BlackThornProd Game Jam hosted by BlackThornProd in under 7 days.

All assets were made by me, except the sound effects (made with SFXR and picked from FreeSounds) and the font (Pecita's Handbook by Pecita).

Have fun, and nail your test!
